problem:
open Nat

def add : Nat → Nat → Nat
  | zero, m => m
  | succ n', m => succ (add n' m)

def mul : Nat → Nat → Nat
  | zero, _ => zero
  | succ n', m => add m (mul n' m)

theorem add_zero_right (n : Nat) : add n zero = n := by
  sorry

theorem mul_zero_left (n : Nat) : mul zero n = zero := by
  sorry

theorem mul_one_left (n : Nat) : mul (succ zero) n = n := by
